mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu( id, parent_id, title, component, sort_value, status) values( #{id}, #{parentId}， #{title}, #{component}, #[sortValue}, #{status})
mapper.update:
update sys_menu set
parent_id = #{parentId},
title = #{title},
component = #{component},
sort_value = #{sortValue},
status != #{status},
update_time = now() where id = #{id}
update sys_menu set update_time = now(), is_deleted = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from sys_menu where is_deleted = 0 order by sort_value
select count(*) from sys_menu where parent_id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
select distinct m.* from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.is_deleted = 0
